ValidationRule.description: When User Select On Date of PickList and Enter data in Project Construction Stages
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Is_to_be_Paid__c , 'On Date') ,NOT( ISBLANK( Project_Construction_Stages__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting On Date Pick Value,You cannn't enter in Project Construction Stages
